title: Fragment, ca. 1700
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic
Technique: brocaded damask
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Basket of flowers and fantastic shapes in silver, blue, green, yellow and white on salmon ground. The style is sometime called 'bizarre'.
